Class PriorityProxyDataBaseTable

java.lang.Object
PriorityProxyDataBaseTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITable
public class PriorityProxyDataBaseTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITable
Since:
30-12-2020 Homework 2 - 161044036 Proxy Database Table Prioritizes writers of DataBaseTable more than readers in terms of table row access.
Author:
Furkan Ozev
